text: I am migrating one blog engine content to a newly created one. It wasn't immediately apparent that the domain drop down was were you can switch blog engine. I was wondering if for the new release you can put a drop down for the blog field instead of on the domain.

Hi there Isaiah, the best way to get your suggestion implemented is to submit it to the idea forum, then you can come back to this slack and link to it from the <#C26E7JT8V|ideas>  to help get upvotes.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/custom/page/page-id/ideaslandingpage>
